casebody.data:
R.G. & G.R. HARRIS FUNERAL HOMES, INC., petitioner,
v.
EQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITY COMMISSION, et al. No. 18-107. Supreme Court of the United States April 22, 2019.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit granted limited to the following question: Whether Title VII prohibits discrimination against transgender people based on (1) their status as transgender (2) sex stereotyping under Price Waterhouse v. Hopkins, 490 U.S. 228, 109 S.Ct. 1775, 104 L.Ed.2d 268 (1989).
